# AlternativeTo.net - Research Results

## 1. Page Title and Main Content

**Page Title:** AlternativeTo - Crowdsourced software recommendations

**Main Content Summary:**
- AlternativeTo is a crowd-sourced and free website that helps users find better apps and services
- The site currently features **137,467 Apps & Software Alternatives** ranked by **2,001,375 User Opinions**
- The mission is: "helping you find the right software for your computer, mobile phone or tablet"
- Main focus is on providing alternatives to software users already know and want to replace
- The site is made by Ola and Markus in Sweden, with contributions from around the world
- All lists of alternatives are crowd-sourced, making the data powerful and relevant

**Statistics (as of Feb 2026):**
- 137,467+ apps listed
- 2,001,375+ user opinions
- 12,998+ new app releases

---

## 2. How to Submit a New Software

**Submit Page URL:** `https://alternativeto.net/software/submit/`

**Requirements to Submit:**
- Users must **sign up** and **sign in** to submit new software
- Registration is free

**Sign In / Sign Up URLs:**
- Sign In: `https://alternativeto.net/api/auth/login`
- Sign Up: `https://alternativeto.net/api/auth/login?screen_hint=signup&returnTo=/user/edit/`

**Note:** The direct submit page is protected by Cloudflare security. To submit software:
1. Create a free account at AlternativeTo.net
2. Sign in to your account
3. Navigate to the submit page or look for "Add" functionality when browsing software

**Contact for submissions/issues:**
- Email: hello@alternativeto.net
- Discord: https://discord.gg/VS45yNS

---

## 3. Navigation Menus

### Main Navigation Bar
| Menu Item | URL | Description |
|-----------|-----|-------------|
| **NEW APPS** | `/browse/new-apps/` | New App Releases - latest submissions |
| **ALL APPS / BROWSE ALL APPS** | `/browse/` | Browse all software by category/platform |
| **NEWS / TECH NEWS** | `/news/all/` | Technology news and updates |
| **LISTS** | `/lists/` | Curated software lists |

### Category Navigation (Top-level)
- AI Tools & Services
- Audio & Music
- Backup & Sync
- Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency
- Business & Commerce
- CD/DVD Tools
- Development
- Education & Reference
- File Management
- File Sharing
- Games
- Gaming Software
- Home & Family
- Network & Admin
- News & Books
- Office & Productivity
- Online Services
- OS & Utilities
- Photos & Graphics
- Remote Work & Education
- Security & Privacy
- Social & Communications
- Sport & Health
- System & Hardware
- Travel & Location
- Video & Movies
- Web Browsers

### Platform Filters
- **Desktop:** Windows, Mac, Linux, Chrome OS, BSD, FreeBSD, GNOME, Xfce, KDE Plasma, Debian, Ubuntu, Arch Linux, OpenBSD, Oracle Solaris, openSUSE
- **Mobile:** Android, iPhone, F-Droid, Linux Mobile, HUAWEI AppGallery, Samsung Galaxy Store, Ubuntu Touch, Sailfish OS
- **Tablet:** iPad, Android Tablet, Kindle Fire
- **Browser:** Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Safari, Opera, Chromium, Brave, Vivaldi, Internet Explorer, etc.
- **Web:** Online, SaaS, Self-Hosted, Wordpress

### Footer Links
- FAQ: `/faq/`
- Privacy Policy: `/about/privacy/`
- Cookie Policy: `/about/cookie-policy/`
- About: `/about/`

---

## 4. Key URL Patterns

| Function | URL Pattern |
|----------|--------------|
| Software listing | `/software/[software-name]/` |
| Software about | `/software/[software-name]/about/` |
| Software alternatives | `/software/[software-name]/` |
| Submit new software | `/software/submit/` |
| Browse all | `/browse/` |
| New apps | `/browse/new-apps/` |
| Categories | `/category/[category-name]/` |
| News | `/news/all/` |
| Lists | `/lists/` |
| User login | `/api/auth/login` |
| RSS feed | `https://feed.alternativeto.net/releases/all` |

---

## 5. Additional Notes

- The website uses Cloudflare protection, which may block automated access
- The site is built with Docker (app-router version)
- Owned by 27 Kilobyte AB in Stockholm, Sweden
- Content is crowd-sourced from user contributions
- Users can write reviews, rate software, and suggest alternatives
